channel.title: Pages on Unified Theory
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Unified Theory

item.title: Who Am I?
item.description: This question plagues me every day. What is my identity? Are identity and consciousness the same thing? If my all my cells have regenerated every seven years, am I the same person that I was in my twenties? How does my consciousness preserve my sense of identity? Those are fun questions but not very useful for you, so here’s some facts about me: I’m a credentialed violist This means that a lot of money changed hands for me to understand music from dead people.
